trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around April 15th 2011
Summary: 2 very small white dots hovering next to each other.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my mother's house watching a UFO documentary with her. When it was over she went into the kitchen, and I went outside. The sky was very cloudy with big puffy low clouds, as I was looking for UFOs. Low in the south I saw 2 very small white dots hovering next to each other. Then I noticed they were alternately shooting electricity from them in the form of a bullhorn or cone. The one to my left shot right at me, as though it seen me then the 2 slowly moved together in unison to my right behind a big cloud. That's all I saw. Around 5 years ago I saw at dusk from Tomy's restaurant a small dot of light blue light traveling northward. Every 7 seconds it shot out from it a large cone that seemed to make a hole in the sky about 20 feet in diameter. 4 months I could not sleep, and looking out my window from my bed I saw near the edge of my roof a small blue green hovering light that shot out a cone of white light every 7 seconds. It was about 12,000 feet high, and I watched it for around 10 minutes. Can these objects be effecting our weather? As far as I know weather has been really weird at least around where I live, and in NC and NY. Thank you.
